column1: Variable Value Variable Description Edition Elisa 300 Elisa 500 Elisa 600 Elisa
‘v’ volume control mode(VCV, CMV) Y Y Y Y
‘p’ pressure control mode(PCV) Y Y Y Y
‘s’ SIMV, SIMV-VC Y Y Y Y
‘c’ CPAP, CPAP/PSV Y Y Y Y
enabled Audio enabled, device in normal state.
audio- Audio paused temporarily, often for 2 or 3 minutes and often can be interrupted by higher
paused priority or critical alarms. It is often done by pushing the Mute/Silence function key on thedevice.
